title: Is it only Europeans and East Asian people who can create first world economies and societies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Israel is doing it, and we’re Near Easterners. If you had asked the same question 70 years ago, Japan, Taiwan, South Korea, and Singapore wouldn’t have done it. Go back 140 years and the Europeans wouldn’t have either. So have a brain. India, Nigeria, the Caucasus nations, and other countries are up and coming. If Iran can unshackle itself from the Mullahs it will join them.

Of course. Was , is and always will be. Other nations are fakers and pretenders. The only way one certain nation will do it is by cheating and stealing. Northern Eurasia, the whites of the West and of the East, people of the ice and snow will always prevail.
